articles.title: Chidambaram Avoids ED Arrest Till Tomorrow But Fails to Evade CBI as Delhi Court Extends Custody by 5 Day... - News18
articles.description: The CBI sought extension of Chidambaram's custody by four days to confront him with certain e-mails and to unearth larger conspiracy.
articles.content: New Delhi: In a major setback to Congress leader and former finance minister P Chidambaram, the Supreme Court on Monday rejected his petition against the Delhi High Court verdict which had dismissed his anticipatory bail plea in a corruption case lodged by th… [+5696 chars]
